DOC.brief_title: A First In Human Study In Healthy People To Evaluate Safety , Toleration , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics Single Oral Doses Of PF-06372865
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject female subject nonchild bear potential age 18 55 year , inclusive . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . An informed consent document sign date subject Subjects willing able comply schedule visit , treatment plan , laboratory test , study procedure . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . Any condition possibly affect drug absorption ( e.g. , gastrectomy ) . A positive urine drug screen .
